Unnamed ECA Staff Member: Misappropriation of US$12,000 in DSA for conference participants.
Handling of US$49,000 with discrepancies in payments.
ACGD Officer: Involvement in handling significant sums for DSA and expenses.
Acknowledged receipt of unrecorded funds totaling US$50,627.

Staff Regulation 1.2 (g): Staff members shall not use their office or knowledge gained from their official functions for private gain.
Financial Rule 104.9: Officials to whom cash advances are issued shall be held personally accountable and financially liable.
